name: docker-wkhtmltopdf-aas
description: A PDF Serice API that renders HTML templates to PDF
author: Fabian Beuke

scripts.start: while true; do coffee app.coffee; done
scripts.docker: docker build -t pdf-service . && docker run -t -e USER='gooduser' -e PASS='secretpassword' -e PAYLOAD_LIMIT='50mb' -p 127.0.0.1:80:5555 pdf-service
scripts.test: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test.coffee --timeout 5000 && istanbul report

engines.//: base64 function does not work on lower
